suite.name: Web API
suite.description: Users can access the Web API by clicking on the "Web API" option from the Quick Access Buttons. The Web API provides a set of endpoints for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on tasks. It allows users to interact with the application programmatically.

custom.expected: Verify the Home page of the app is opened. The WEB API button is displayed in quick access buttons.

custom.steps: Open the app Click on the WEB API button
custom.expected: Verify the Home page is opened. Try the click on the WEB API button and open the following page.
